description: Tyler Torro has decided to go in for a routine physical.  He's never had a prostate exam before, but he nervously checked the box while in the waiting room. Tyler is happy to accommodate the Doctor.  When a patient this hot is naked on the evaluation table in Mario Vega's examination room, someone's getting fucked.  It's a good thing Tyler is able to bang Dr. Vega with some good, hard strength!  Enjoy!
title: The Cock Doc
